code: import React from"react";import{Card,Button}from"react-bootstrap";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NewsCard=_ref=>{let{title,description,url,source,image,published_date}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"mb-4 shadow-lg",children:[image&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{variant:"top",src:image,style:{borderRadius:'15px 15px 0 0'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{className:"mb-3",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{className:"mb-4",children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{className:"text-muted small mb-1",children:["Published: ",new Date(published_date).toLocaleDateString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{className:"text-muted small",children:["Source: ",source]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",href:url,target:"_blank",children:"Read More"})]})]})]});};export default NewsCard;
